availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on November 21, 1829 in Anderson County. Married Mary Ann Rinehart on March 16, 1858. Children included Sarah Alice, William Louis, John Stephen, Mary Florence, Lydia Frances, Edward Holmes, and James Oscar. Died on September 19, 1909 in Anderson County.

bibl.p: "Kentucky, County Marriages, 1797-1954," database with images, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:F4QV-CQC ), Benjamin H. Franklin and Mary Ann Rinehart, 16 Mar 1858; citing , Anderson, Kentucky, United States, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond; FHL microfilm 1,550,673.
